title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, April 1, 2021
description: Anne McCaffrey was born on this day 1926. A pioneer for women in science fiction writing, she was the first female winner of both the Hugo and Nebula awards.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Anne McCaffrey was born on this day 1926. A pioneer for women in science fiction writing, she was the first female winner of both the Hugo and Nebula awards.
